message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. My asking price is $140, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go as low as $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $130? This is still a great deal for you, and it would allow me to make a fair profit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
